bsun.startMessage: Game started. The sun makes you faster! Map: Burning Sun

bmoon.startMessage: Game started. The cold is unbearable. Map: Frozen Moon

Tips: SUN: Spam your A spell plant to reduce your cooldowns quickly.
TERRAIN: Water slows you down and increases your cooldown, land disables water spells, and graves block most spells.
OFFENSE: Your main damage output is likely going to be in your Q, W, or R slot.
DEFENSE: There are many plants that discourage going near you and your cooldown reduction, which is important to prevent melee or shovelling.
SHOVEL: Shovelling is crucial. It destroys almost every plant.
MOBILITY: Not many mobility options exist. Only a few spells, such as Puff-Shroom and Parsnip, give a speed boost.
SYNERGIES: Some synergies are built in; However, there are many powerful combinations to discover like Magnet-Shroom and Spikeweed. Be creative!
